## Test Goal
What behavior or security property is being tested?

## Scenario
Describe the scenario step-by-step.

## Tasks
- [ ] Write test setup
- [ ] Simulate scenario
- [ ] Assert expected behavior
- [ ] Ensure test is deterministic

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Test fails before fix
- [ ] Test passes after fix
- [ ] Test is repeatable and isolated

## Notes
Any edge cases or follow-ups.
